samples.name: Storing and retrieving local data
samples.description: You can store and retrieve data in your app using application-settings module of NativeScript. This demo shows you the various API available with application-settings module.

samples.name: Detecting online/offline connectivity
samples.description: You can easily monitor network status of the device using NativeScript's connectivity module.

samples.name: Displaying a basic chart with RadChart
samples.description: Use RadCharts to display data creatively in your apps. There are various chart types to choose from. This demo shows Bar Chart type.

samples.name: Displaying a basic gauge with RadGauges
samples.description: Use RadGauges to show progress of some tasks or any circular UI/UX experience that you can think of that involves gauges.
